mapper.select: SELECT cb_name, a_addr1, cb_grade, cb_hit, cb_no FROM ( SELECT cb_name, a_addr1, cb_grade, cb_hit, cb_no, rownum as num FROM ( SELECT cb_name, a_addr1, cb_grade, cb_hit, cb_no FROM clubBar WHERE a_addr1 LIKE '%'||#{addr_name}||'%' OR cb_name LIKE '%'||#{search_name}||'%')) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/5) FROM( SELECT cb_name, a_addr1, cb_grade, cb_hit FROM clubBar WHERE a_addr1 LIKE '%'||#{addr_name}||'%' )

SELECT b_no,b_subject, m_nick, b_regdate,b_grade, b_hit, num FROM (SELECT b_no,b_subject, m_nick,b_regdate,b_grade, b_hit, rownum as num FROM (SELECT b_no,b.b_subject, m.m_nick, b.b_regdate,b_grade, b.b_hit FROM board b, member m where b_subject LIKE '%'||#{search_name}||'%' AND b.m_email=m.m_email ORDER BY b.b_no DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start2} AND #{end2}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/5) FROM board WHERE b_subject LIKE '%'||#{search_name}||'%'
